import '../../Login/Login.css' import { useState, } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' function Login() { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [message, setMessage] = useState('') const dispatch = useDispatch() async function handleAdminLogin() { let data = await axios.get("/admin/login", { email, password }) if (data.error) { setMessage(data.message) } setMessage('') dispatch({ type: "refresh" }) } return (

Admin Login

setEmail(e.target.value)} className="form-control" placeholder="email" required />
setPassword(e.target.value)} type="password" className="form-control" placeholder="Password" required />
